House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07870
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING HAZARD PAY TO ALL PUBLIC PROSECUTORS, ASSOCIATE PROSECUTION ATTORNEYS AND PROSECUTION ATTORNEYS DURING THEIR INCUMBENCY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Grants all public prosecutors, associate prosecution attorneys and prosecution attorneys hazard pay during their incumbency in the amount equivalent to twenty-five percent (25%) of their basic monthly salary per month and shall not be subject to tax.
ALIAS NAME : “Hazard Pay for all Prosecutors Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GATCHALIAN, WES
DATE FILED : 2018-06-14
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2018-07-30
